name: Flustagon
description:
A game based on the simple kindergarten activity of matching shapes, only this time there's a time limit. Red shapes shall approach a green shape that you have to control and match up to.

Controls:

  • Rotate shape - move mouse / swipe
  • Change shape - click / tap
  • Pause - space / "P" at top right corner

This game is built for Windows, Linux, Android and WebGL and supports both touchscreen and mouse, which is dependant on what input you use to start each play with.
